text: Kate Cary (born 4 November 1967 in England) is an author. She works with Cherith Baldry and Victoria Holmes on the Warriors book series under the pen name Erin Hunter. She has also written books on her own, such as Bloodline and Reckoning. Cary owns three cats. She also has a son, and she lives in England. She has lived in Scotland before. == References == ==Other websites== * Warriors website * Kate Cary's blog Category:1967 births Category:Living people Category:21st-century English writers
title: Kate Cary
